section.title: Known Problems
section.para: The following problems and limitations are known to exist for MDS4 Trigger at the time of the version release:

listitem.simpara: Due to the recency of the current release, it is still in a developmental state.

Some of the previously implemented features have not yet been reimplemented in the current version, most notably: minimum firing interval, minimum match time, start/end/invalidity time functionality, action script input/output
